contextId.information: Paul speaks of the grace of God as if it were a person who goes to other people and trains them to live holy lives. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
contextId.quote: the grace of God has appeared ... trains us

contextId.information: Paul speaks of our sinful desires as if they were people who led us off the right path. AT: "we were deceived" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
contextId.quote: led astray ... by various passions and pleasures

contextId.information: Paul speaks of God's kindness and love as if they were people that came into our sight. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
contextId.quote: when the kindness of God our savior and his love for mankind appeared
